title: Mixed Biscuits
img_alt: Peggy Babcock's Mixed Biscuit in a tin
body:
Our iconic range that started life as a way for tiny chimney sweeps to have affordable access to refined carbohydrates became a global phenomenon from the 1960s onwards.

Nowadays our mixed biscuitsâ„¢ are just one way for for families to stockpile their daily calorie count, with our new and exciting range of baked goods:

  • Bag'o'Biscuits
  • Biscuit Crumbs
  • Biscuit Dust
  • Biscuit Scrapings
